ingredients: 1 tablespoon Thai red or green chili paste (you can add more if you like things really spicy, just be careful this stuff's hot!!)
2 to 3 cloves garlic, finely chopped or grated
1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1 green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
1/2 large eggplant, peeled and cut into chunks
2 pounds bone-in skinless chicken thighs (about 6 thighs)
1 lime, cut into wedges, to garnish
